thread.title: Mr Harrison
thread.title_full: Glasses Direct reviewed by Mr Harrison

author: Mr Harrison
title: Mr Harrison
text: Thanks to a special offer, I was able to buy two pairs of glasses, with different prescriptions (one for reading, one for distance) very cheaply. But even Glasses Direct's list prices beat the major high street opticians, and the cost of extras (coatings etc.) is very reasonable. There's a decent choice of frames for everyday use, plus "designer" ones if you want to spend a little more on something a bit different. The glasses were delivered within a couple of weeks, which is comparable with other opticians I've used.
